ValidationRule.description: Require the deputy to be assigned before a case can be under investigation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Under Investigation' ) && ISBLANK ( Assigned_Deputy__c ) && NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator') ) && NOT( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PAGA_Case')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A deputy must be assigned in order to make place this case under investigation.
